resources.string: This app utilises the API from exchangeratesapi.io. The creator of this app has set a default API key which is connected to his paid subscription.

This app was developed for CP5307 Advanced Mobile Technology of James Cook University Brisbane.\n\n This app is dedicated to Ritchelle and Ethan whom without them would have been done 1 week earlier. ¯\\_(ツ)_/¯

Material Design - https://material.io/
 Google Fonts and Icons - https://fonts.google.com/
 Android Volley - https://google.github.io/volley/
 RX Java - https://github.com/ReactiveX/RxJava
